name: Simple Instant Messenger

screenshots.caption: Contextual menu of SimplissIM's contacts list.

short_description: SimplissIM is a simple instant messenger for local networks where people want to chat, not tweak their software settings. Automatic presence, no server needed, no list of contact to maintain (people appear automatically), seamless file sending...
